whiskers:
Whiskers always stocks **8 common, 4 uncommon**, and **8 rare** items. The pool has a total of **101** items.

**Common (21)** 🐟 
Bantam Eggs, Black Ink, Bricks, Bug Flour, Cotton, Fish, Iron Bars, Large Autumn Leaves, Large Crunchy Leaves, Large Leaves, Mixed Seeds, Paints, Poultry, Red Meat, Rice, Rocks, Spool Of Thread, Sticks, Sticky Glue, Tea Leaves, Wooden Planks

**Uncommon (21)** 🪶 
Cat-Tatoes, Catbage, Catrots, Clay, Crayfish, Crickets, Feathers, Freshwater Mussels, Graphite, Iron Ore, Leather, Oil, Paper Bark, Sand, Silkworm Cocoon, Snow Ants, Snowmeowtoes, Snowpeas, Snowspider Silk, Wildflowers, Woolly Bun Wool

**Rare (59)** 🌷 
Black Tulips, Bleeding Hearts, Bones, Broccatli, Button Mushrooms, Catmint, Caulimeower, Chamomile, Chromite, Cobalt Ore, Copper Ore, Crocus, Daisies, Dandelion, Fallen Meteorite, Fireflies, Forget-Me-Not, Fur Hide, Gold Ore, Green Dianthus, Honeycomb, Lakeweed, Licorice, Limestone, Mini-Pig Cheese, Mini-Pig Milk, Nickel Ore, Nitratine, Not-Holly, Parsley, Periwinkle, Poisonous Mushrooms, Red Carnations, Rosemary, Scales, Silver Fireflies, Silver Ore, Silverseal, Snowcap Mushrooms, Snowdrops, Starfruit, Sulfur, Sunflowers, Sweet Cat-Tatoes, Thyme, Tiger Lilies, Tin, Tree Sap, Uncut Amethyst, Uncut Diamond, Uncut Emerald, Uncut Quartz, Uncut Rose Quartz, Uncut Ruby, Uncut Sapphire, Violets, Walnuts, Watermeowlon, Wintermint

info: 🕊️  Stork is developed by **Duke #49** as a utility bot for Pixel Cat's End. Questions, suggestions, and other forms of feedback are welcome!
beanstats:
Cats generated randomly by the site (eg Nestor) are 4d6 for each stat.

Cats from parents are 3d6 + a random value from a range that depends on the parents stats. That range goes from 1-3 (if both parents have very very low stats) to 4-6 (if both parents have very very high stats).

For most cat pairings, the range will be the standard 1-6 or possibly 1-5 or 2-6. Unless you're breeding cats that share an extreme trait, the influence won't be more than that.

Source: <https://www.pixelcatsend.com/forum&topic=3159&page=1#32357>

littermates:
If beans become young kittens and do not have littermates, their bravery and extroversion stats will have one point deducted. To avoid this, you can assign them adoptive littermates.
This does not alter your cats parents' or other siblings, only the involved beans.

If you have multiple litters of beans, there will be an option on the page of a lonely bean, below "Edit Biographical Info," that says "Assign Adoptive Littermates." The page gives you a dropdown of available litters to give to the bean as littermates.
https://www.pixelcatsend.com/article&article=16
https://www.pixelcatsend.com/article&article=17
stats:
Initiative = perception stat + ( # dice * ( cat's highest level - 1 ) )
Health = health stat + ( # dice * ( cat's highest level - 1 ) )
